## sampleBilinear() function

Returns a bilinear-interpolated texture sample for a given texture.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function sampleBilinear(texture: TypedArray, width: number, height: number, u: number, v: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  texture | TypedArray | Two-dimensional texture to sample. |
|  width | number | Texture width. |
|  height | number | Texture height. |
|  u | number | Number between 0 and 1 representing the location to sample in the width dimension. |
|  v | number | Number between 0 and 1 representing the location to sample in the height dimension. |

<b>Returns:</b>

number
